experiences.title: Freelance Web Developer
description: In this project, I worked alone to develop a simple web app for an automotive dealer company using Bootstrap and CodeIgniter within a tight five-week deadline.

experiences.title: Freelance Web Developer
description: In this project, I worked alone to develop a campaign microsite for a FTUI alumni association election candidate using Figma and Bootstrap within a tight two-week deadline.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: In this internship, I worked under the supervision of a senior developer for a logistics startup to develop desktop and mobile user interfaces using Bootstrap and CodeIgniter during a three-month internship.

education.title: Information System and Technology
description: Learned and implemented the concepts of Software Engineering, a total of 25 SCH: Introduction to Computation, Programming Fundamentals, Algorithm and Data Structure IST, Object-Oriented Programming IST, Software Engineering IST, Mobile Platform & Application Development, Human Computer Interaction, Database Modeling, Database Management.

organizational.title: Secretary General
description: Assisted the chairman in day-to-day coordination of 22 work divisions within a team of 60+ people.
Developed an integrated student needs service center and sustainable knowledge management systems, impacting over 1,000 HMIF ITB students.

organizational.title: Secretary General
description: Assisted the project officer in tightly coordinating 12 work divisions within a team of 120+ people.
Built a robust and sustainable Discord-based project framework, impacting over 400 sophomore ITB students.

organizational.title: Secretary General
description: Assisted the project officer in coordinating 3 work divisions within a team of 15 people.
Collaborated with the KM ITB Freshman Ministry to curate local and national leaders as speakers, impacting over 100 freshman ITB students.

teaching.title: Training Facilitator of Initiator Class Vol 1 & 2
description: Two times volunteering as Training Facilitator (monthly: Aug, Sep), teaching design thinking principles and frameworks in Initiator Class Vol 1 and teaching initiating social movement skills in Initiator Class Vol 2.
My mentee group achieved best team awards on vol 1 & 2.

teaching.title: Training Facilitator of Kawah Kepemimpinan Pelajar Jawa Barat
description: Three times volunteering as training facilitator (annually: 2017, 2018, 2019), teaching leadership skills and principles to over 300 student organization leaders from all over West Java.
Gained this opportunity from my achievement as West Java representative at KKP Nasional 2017.
